title: 9.1 Master Challenge 3
question:
The WWW has enabled access to education anywhere in the world. Online learning platforms like edX offer courses and certifications from top universities and industry experts.
● How has edX changed the lives of people in many ways? Explain in brief.
● Did edX developers foresee every change ahead of time?
● Explain the benefits and negative effects of edX on individuals, society, the economy, and culture.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
